body: In general we don't do >= 0 tests in CuTorch, see e.g: https://github.com/torch/cutorch/blob/master/lib/THC/THCTensorIndex.cu#L38 and others in that file, because we have `typename IndexType` as an `unsigned int` or `unsigned long`.
body_html: In general we don't do >= 0 tests in CuTorch, see e.g: https://github.com/torch/cutorch/blob/master/lib/THC/THCTensorIndex.cu#L38 and others in that file, because we have typename IndexType as an unsigned int or unsigned long.
body_text: In general we don't do >= 0 tests in CuTorch, see e.g: https://github.com/torch/cutorch/blob/master/lib/THC/THCTensorIndex.cu#L38 and others in that file, because we have typename IndexType as an unsigned int or unsigned long.
